content.rendered:
Directed by Kim Hui-won.

Written by Chung Seo-kyung.

Cast Nam Ji-hyun (Oh In-kyung 1). Wi Ha-joon (Choi Do-il 1). Uhm Ji-won (Won Sang-ah 1). Park Ji-hu (Oh In-hye 1). Uhm Ki-joon (Park Jae-sang 1). Kang Hoon (Ha Jong-ho 1). Jeon Chae-eun (Park Hyo-rin 1). Park Bo-kyung (Go Soo-im 1). Kim Mi-sook (Oh Hye-suk). Chu Ja-hyeon (Jin Hwa-young). Gong Min-jung (Choi Ma-ri). Kim Myung-soo (Choi Hee-jae). Lee Do-yeop (General Won Gi-seon). Jang Gwang (Jang Sa-pyeong). Jo Seung-yeon (Jo Wan-gyu). Jeon Jin-oh (Cheon Sang-hyeok). Oh Jung-se (Director Shin Hyeon-min/Ep). Nam Gi-ae (An So-yeong). Lee Min-woo (Won Sang-woo). Kim Jung-pal (Lee Yong-gwi). Cho Yeon-jin (Hwang Bo-yeon). Park Ji-young (Ahn Hee-yeon). Na Chul (Public Defender). Song Joong-ki (Shoes Salesman). Yeo Woon-bok (Victims’ Representative). Min Kyung-jin (Ha Jong-ho’s Grandfather). Hong Seo-hui (Expensive Shoes Woman). Ron Kelly (Joel Filtz). Kim Ye-gyeom (Won Sang-ah (teen))

Language Korean.

Producers Bong Hoon Cho. See als. Release Dates | Official Sites | Company Credits | Filmin/Epg & Production | Technical Specs. Getting Started | Contributor Zone . Contribute to This Pag. Edit pag. Top Ga. Answe. See more gaps . Add episod. Little Women (TV Series). Detail. Full Cast and Cre. Release Date. Official Site. Company Credit.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 12

Status On Going (2022–)
